name: toasteur
description: Create beuitiful and customizable toast notifications for your website, similar to toastr.js but don't require jQuery

scripts.build: css-minify -d src/themes -o dist/themes; browserify -s Toasteur src/index.js | uglifyjs -c > dist/toasteur.min.js
